sub_title: Sustainability Expert | Impact Investing | ESG | Climate
summary: I am a competent and passionate project manager and sustainability advisor with solid knowledge of ESG, climate, policy development and public infrastructure. I derive energy from supporting organizations in increasing their positive impact and reducing their negative impact on people, the environment and society in a way that supports the (commercial) interests of the organization. International economic cooperation with a focus on sustainability and equality within public administration is the common thread in my career. I have an enormous passion to contribute to a better world and climate through my work and in my private life. Previous work experience gave me consolidated skills in planning and overseeing (international) multi-stakeholder projects to ensure compliance in strict timeframes. Moreover, I am a driven team-player who is dedicated to reach set goals and to create a motivational work environment for the team.
